host_about:
I would describe myself as a very determined and highly motivated person.  I take my job seriously but able to see things in perspective and I'm very easy-going to work with. I am an optimist rather than pessimist and cope well when the going gets tough; I am also very good at finding solutions to problems. Above all, I would like to say I relish a challenge.
I would also like to add that your stay and experience is of the utmost importance to me, therefore I am available before the booking and during the stay to answer all your concerns and anxieties.  For example where one would go to eat and taste the local culinary delights, easy and cheap ways to travel around London (this can be a daunting experience – believe me!)
A little about the apartments, houses and the rooms that you will stay in.  Firstly there are no hidden charges for the use of any utilities (gas, electric, water, Internet).  Linens are provided during your stay and there is access to a fully working kitchen and laundry facilities. 
What is my customer service philosophy?
I believe the customer is central to everything I do.  I therefore consequently attach a lot of importance to customer service.  I believe I have strong customer service skills – and working with the public is certainly something I look forward to and enjoy.

T&A Real Estate has adopted the principle of gaining absolute customer satisfaction with the management and working understanding it has developed and applied with the experience gained in the real estate sector since its establishment in 2015. Our company has adopted values such as change, efficiency, customer orientation as """"""""corporate culture"""""""" in all areas and periods of its working activities and continues its services knowing that the secret of its success lies in managing these values. As of now, T&A Real Estate has brought to the fore its customer-oriented marketing approach with its 3 separate offices in Istanbul, Kyrenia and Munich and more than twenty domestic and foreign personnel. Our company has determined its service strategies that it started with an understanding of """"""""trust and quality"""""""" in line with this goal. T&A Real Estate, together with its employees, aims to ensure healthy development and to provide services at universal quality and standards by ensuring the satisfaction of its customers. In this way, it aims to be a symbol of reliability, continuity and respectability for its customers.

Hello 

We live in Soho and love it here -  British born and raised and have been here in London for an approximate of 35 years. I am experienced Property sales negotiator with a passion for customer service... Combining having worked in Hospitality for many years I now primarily focus on our own clients needs whilst they are in turn eager to see what PLC have to offer here in London. 

We love the fact that we have a part to play in order to make people feel as comfortable as we would like to feel whilst traveling. We love to travel and like the way other hosts greet us... We have been in some great company from people around the world both here in London and on our own travels.

My new project and Venture with Brand New website coming very soon Is- 

The property | Lifestyle | Concierge London 

Dealing with Property on a Fully managed basis for landlords is nothing new to me, I have been in the industry for 21 years and have built a great reputation with colleagues and clients who are keen to work with the fresh ideas the PLC team have brought to the table every day.

Property 
Long And Short term rentals and property management  

Property management with bespoke management services tailor made to the client's lifestyle 
Or let only 
Short term lets fully managed 
Sales 
Commercial 
Relocation - corporate or domestic we will see the client through from start to finish
Maintenance (link to 2nd company and website) 

Lifestyle 

Interior design is at the forefront of the company at the moment as well as currently decorating all our 15 Short term apartments I offer an interior design service to all and I have very happy to quote for works you may like in your own apartments - I enjoy the work also .... it's a great way of clearing the mind 
Cleaning Service (end of tenancy, short let cleaning for private hosts, weekly domestic cleaner, commercial cleaning, communal area cleaning)
Laundry Service wash and collection / drop off Service Plus walk in (a Soho based service wash unit on Frith street) this is available to all hosts in the area so please do ask me 
Furniture packs (I also work with a company based in Soho and get commission for every furniture pack I sell so I would like this service on our website

Concierge 

This is for Landlords, tenants, Guests and Hosts but also needs to be available to the general public and not just our clients. 

The services we can provide are once again endless and something I have done for people in the past range from a short let guests from the U.S wanted cup final tickets for Chelsea v Southampton (I think) and yes it happened 
Theatre tickets no problem at all
Airport runs to and from - all we need is the flight number 
Once Took a cat to the vets for a lovely lady in one of my long term properties 
Again, this is endless 
Booking Restuarnts - after recommending it of course and getting the guests / client discount 
We will try to help in any way 


• In depth knowledge of the London LGBTQ community
• Great net-worker, likable, with a great sense of humor
• Effective communicators
• Positive sales and customer care experience
• Hard working, flexible and adaptable, team player
• Strong leadership skills... People are amazing 
• Works well under pressure and committed to deadlines
• Creative, accountable and dependable

A lover of the outdoors. I enjoy kayaking, hiking and people watch (yep! that's a thing). Although I have a dog allergy I still very much love dogs. With that said, I do not welcome guests with dogs or any type of animals in my home. 

I've traveled throughout Europe and lived in the Caribbean for several years.

An advocate of volunteering. I spend most of my free time working with at-risk youth, serve as a mentor to Black and Hispanic high school girls. And because I cannot get enough, I volunteer my time at non-profit organizations that invest in preparing women who have been recently incarcerated with the necessary skills that will help them to reintegrate in the work place and in society.

House Rules
•	Loud noise and disturbing neighbors   NOT permitted.
•	No smoking inside home
•	No animals are permitted.
•	Shoes worn outside should not be worn inside. Please remove shoes at front door.
•	No parties or large gathering inside home.

Guest Access
I personally check-in and out all my guests and do NOT offer self check-in. If you reserved my space, you need to be an occupant. I reserve the right to cancel confirmed reservation made on behalf of someone else. 

The Space
This is a private one-bedroom apartment, open kitchen and living room space. Clean and spacious bathroom and bedroom with a private balcony.  The building has 6 floors with an operating elevator. Free parking on street, digital TV channels and high speed wifii. This is a quiet neighborhood and closely watched community, I will expect courteous adult behavior from my guests. The key is respecting our neighbors and NOT play loud music after 10PM. 

This is my HOME not a HOTEL. 
This building RECYCLE and so should you when disposing your garbage. 

If you become infected with COVID- 19, please inform me immediately. To protect residents and adhere to New York State and Condominium policy, I will need to inform my Management Company. 

Security cameras are located in shared spaces throughout the building for residents safety. There are no cameras in my apartment unit.

Always available via text or call.

Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.
